articles.title: India crush Sri Lanka by 10 wickets to win eighth Asia Cup cricket crown
articles.description: Sri Lanka were bowled all-out for just 50 runs, as India’s Mohammed Siraj claimed a career-best 6-21.
articles.content: India have lifted the Asia Cup for a record-extending eighth time after routing defending champions Sri Lanka by 10 wickets with Mohammed Siraj claiming a career-best 6-21, including four wickets in … [+1982 chars]

articles.description: England have talked golf, padel and cricket in the build-up to Sunday's pool-stage meeting with Japan, but the fun and games needs to be backed up with further improvement.
